strategy_name: SHORT SELLING - Pump & Dump Hunter v1
description: Detects pump peak and plays the dump using advanced TWPA-based indicators. Enters short at pump peak, exits when dump exhausted.

s1_signal.description: All four conditions must be met: significant pump (15%+), high volume (3x+), fast velocity (0.5%/s+), and multi-timeframe acceleration

positionSize.description: 2% of portfolio per trade (conservative sizing for short selling)

z1_entry.description: Enter short position within 60 seconds of signal. Position size is conservative due to short selling risks.

conditions.description: Cancel if momentum drops < -20% (pump still accelerating, bad entry)

o1_cancel.description: Cancel if pump momentum still strong after 5 minutes. Cooldown prevents rapid re-entry.

ze1_close.description: Exit short when ANY of: exhaustion score high (70+), near support (2%), or velocity stable (0.5). Conservative exit to capture dump profit.

conditions.description: Emergency: momentum reversal >= 50% (strong upward reversal, cut losses)

emergency_exit.description: Emergency exit if strong upward reversal detected (50%+ momentum gain). Prevents catastrophic losses on failed dumps.

notes: Short selling strategy requires careful risk management
Works best on coins with clear pump & dump patterns
Typical pump lasts 2-5 minutes, dump 3-10 minutes
Expected success rate: 60-70% with proper parameter tuning
Use on volatile low-cap coins for best results
